parametro.mensajeError: No se puede Eliminar
Favor revise sus parametros de búsqueda

campos.destino: (SELECT DISTINCT cast(a.asig_ccod as varchar)+'-' + cast(b.secc_tdesc as varchar)+ ' ' + cast(a.asig_tdesc as varchar) AS asignatura_seccion, c.nive_ccod, b.secc_ccod FROM asignaturas a, secciones b, malla_curricular c,planes_estudio d, especialidades e WHERE a.asig_ccod = b.asig_ccod AND c.plan_ccod = d.plan_ccod AND a.asig_ccod = c.asig_ccod ) a

(select distinct cast(b.hora_ccod as varchar)+' - '+ cast(datepart(hour,a.hora_hinicio) as varchar)+':'+ cast(datepart(minute,a.hora_hinicio) as varchar) +' - '+ cast(datepart(hour,a.hora_htermino) as varchar)+':'+ cast(datepart(minute,a.hora_htermino) as varchar) as Bloque_Horario,b.hora_ccod, a.sede_ccod from horarios_sedes a, horarios b where a.hora_ccod=b.hora_ccod ) c
dias_semana

(select a.sala_ccod, a.sede_ccod, esal_ccod, a.sala_ncupo , cast(Left(tsal_tdesc,1) as varchar) + '-' + cast(sala_ciso as varchar)+ '(' + cast(sala_ncupo as varchar)+ ')' as sala from salas a, tipos_sala b where a.tsal_ccod=b.tsal_ccod) a

parametro.mensajeError: No existen bloques para las condiciones
No existen bloques para las condiciones

campos.destino: ( SELECT b.pers_ncorr, b.sede_ccod,cast(a.pers_tape_paterno as varchar)+ ' ' + cast(a.pers_tape_materno as varchar)+ ', ' + cast(a.pers_tnombre as varchar) AS docente FROM personas a, profesores b, sedes c WHERE a.pers_ncorr = b.pers_ncorr AND b.sede_ccod = c.sede_ccod ) a

(SELECT b.pers_ncorr, b.sede_ccod, cast(a.pers_tape_paterno as varchar)+' ' + cast(a.pers_tape_materno as varchar)+', '+ cast(a.pers_tnombre as varchar) AS docente FROM personas a, profesores b, sedes c WHERE a.pers_ncorr = b.pers_ncorr AND b.sede_ccod = c.sede_ccod ) a

(SELECT a.sede_ccod, a.sala_ccod, cast(b.tsal_tdesc as varchar)+ ' - ' + cast(a.sala_ciso as varchar) as Aula FROM salas a, tipos_sala b where a.tsal_ccod = b.tsal_ccod and a.sala_tdesc not in ('SALA PRODUCTO MIGRACION DATOS')) a

parametro.mensajeError: No existen registros asociados.
No existen bloqueos asociados.

campos.destino: estados_bloqueos

parametro.mensajeError: No hay compromisos asociados a la persona
No hay compromisos asociados a la persona

campos.destino: tipos_ingresos
IMPRESORAS
tipos_ingresos
(select banc_ccod, banc_tdesc from bancos) a
(select plaz_ccod, plaz_tdesc from plazas) a
tipos_ingresos
(select distinct inst_ccod, inst_trazon_social as institucion from instituciones) a

(select distinct cast(b.carr_tdesc as varchar)+ ' ' + cast(a.espe_tdesc as varchar) as carrera, a.espe_ccod as espe_ccod, d.sede_ccod as sede_ccod from especialidades a, carreras b, ofertas_academicas c, sedes d where a.carr_ccod=b.carr_ccod and a.espe_ccod=c.espe_ccod and c.sede_ccod=d.sede_ccod and cast(espe_bexamen_adm as varchar)='S') a

(select distinct cast(b.carr_tdesc as varchar)+ ' ' + cast(a.espe_tdesc as varchar) as programa, a.espe_ccod as espe_ccod, d.sede_ccod as sede_ccod from especialidades a, carreras b, ofertas_academicas c, sedes d where a.carr_ccod=b.carr_ccod and a.espe_ccod=c.espe_ccod and c.sede_ccod=d.sede_ccod and cast(espe_bexamen_adm as varchar)='S') a
jornadas
(select jorn_ccod,jorn_tdesc from jornadas) a

parametro.mensajeError: No postulantes que coincidan con el criterio de búsqueda

campos.destino: (select distinct b.espe_ccod as espe_ccod, cast(h.carr_tdesc as varchar) +' '+ cast(g.espe_tdesc as varchar) as especialidades, f.pers_nrut as pers_nrut from matriculas a, planes_estudio b, malla_curricular c, asignaturas d, postulantes e, personas f, especialidades g, carreras h where a.plan_ccod = b.plan_ccod and b.plan_ccod = c.plan_ccod and c.asig_ccod = d.asig_ccod and a.post_ncorr = e.post_ncorr and e.pers_ncorr = f.pers_ncorr and b.espe_ccod = g.espe_ccod and g.carr_ccod = h.carr_ccod order by especialidades ) a

parametro.mensajeError: Debe selecionar un programa de estudio.
No hay compromisos asociados a la persona

campos.destino: IMPRESORAS
tipos_ingresos
(select banc_ccod, banc_tdesc from bancos order by banc_tdesc) a
(select plaz_ccod, plaz_tdesc from plazas order by plaz_tdesc) a
tipos_ingresos
(select banc_ccod, banc_tdesc from bancos order by banc_tdesc) a
(select plaz_ccod, plaz_tdesc from plazas order by plaz_tdesc) a

parametro.mensajeError: Seleccione programa de estudio de origen

campos.destino: (SELECT DISTINCT b.plan_ccod, f.pers_nrut, i.secc_ccod AS asig_ccod ,cast(d.asig_ccod as varchar)+' - '+cast(d.asig_tdesc as varchar)+' / '+cast(g.carg_nnota_final as varchar) AS asignatura ,c.nive_ccod AS nive_ccod ,h.sitf_ccod ,i.secc_ccod,d.asig_ccod as asig FROM alumnos a ,planes_estudio b ,malla_curricular c ,asignaturas d ,postulantes e ,personas f ,cargas_academicas g ,situaciones_finales h ,secciones i WHERE a.plan_ccod = b.plan_ccod AND b.plan_ccod = c.plan_ccod AND c.asig_ccod = d.asig_ccod AND a.post_ncorr = e.post_ncorr AND e.pers_ncorr = f.pers_ncorr and a.matr_ncorr = g.matr_ncorr and g.sitf_ccod = h.sitf_ccod and i.secc_ccod = g.secc_ccod and d.asig_ccod = i.asig_ccod AND h.sitf_ccod in ('AA') order by asig) A
campos.mensajeVacio: No hay asignaturas asociadas al plan.

parametro.mensajeError: Seleccione programa de estudio de destino

campos.destino: (select distinct b.espe_ccod as espe_ccod, cast(h.carr_tdesc as varchar)+' '+ cast(g.espe_tdesc as varchar) as especialidades, f.pers_nrut as pers_nrut from matriculas a, planes_estudio b, malla_curricular c, asignaturas d, postulantes e, personas f, especialidades g, carreras h where a.plan_ccod = b.plan_ccod and b.plan_ccod = c.plan_ccod and c.asig_ccod = d.asig_ccod and a.post_ncorr = e.post_ncorr and e.pers_ncorr = f.pers_ncorr and b.espe_ccod = g.espe_ccod and g.carr_ccod = h.carr_ccod order by especialidades ) a

(select distinct e.pers_nrut,b.peri_ccod,cast(d.espe_ccod as varchar)+' '+cast(c.carr_tdesc as varchar)+' '+ cast(d.espe_tdesc as varchar) as especialidad,d.espe_ccod from alumnos a, ofertas_academicas b, carreras c, especialidades d,personas e where a.ofer_ncorr = b.ofer_ncorr and c.carr_ccod = d.carr_ccod and d.espe_ccod = b.espe_ccod and a.pers_ncorr = e.pers_ncorr order by peri_ccod )a
